title: Riot Pls (My Opinion)

embed.description: This is just my reaction to Runes Reforged and the Blue Essence update to League of Legends in their upcoming Season 8. KreepySumz did the original two videos and honestly, probably did them in a much better way. I just don't feel like a "we'll get to you guys" response is acceptable at this point from Riot Games.

body:
KreepySumz did two videos over the Blue Essence store and Runes Reforged. The first one was him venting his feelings on the matter, and the second being him responding to Riot's message on his channel. He took it positively, I did not.

Oh, and P.S. Here's the spreadsheet for calculating Blue Essence that I was talking about: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5PzieBxOKAdUmJ3Tjc1OFpsX0E/view
After clicking on the link, click on the 'Open With' and choose 'Google Sheets'. Then just plug in your numbers!
